title: PvP.Net Client keeps crashing after update
body: League would run fine on my windows 10PC. Now after the 6.18 update, my game crashes and I get bug splat when it transitions to the PvP.Net client, ever time I click "Reconnect" I get the same bug splat over and over... Tried deleting League and re-downloading it completely and I still get the same problem. Not sure what else to do.

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons like bad drivers or hardware issues; though, reinstalling was not a bad step to take.  I suggest going over every step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this.  The guide should get you all fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
I tired it, still the same bug splat, thanks anyway though :b
